data.name: Liftoff - Slipstream
data.detailed_description:
Slipstream

Liftoff: Slipstream adds vehicles for you to chase in a multitude of Liftoff environments: a time trial on Short Circuit, a drag race in Bando City, mining trucks going about their business in The Pit. All of this and more in this DLC pack.

This DLC Includes

  • Cars drag racing in Bando City
  • Cars racing in Short Circuit
  • Model airplanes event in The Green
  • Mining trucks, trucking along in The Pit
  • Cars showing off in Hangar C03
  • New songs by Nightime Burnout
  • 5 new race themed drone skins

data.short_description: The smell of burning rubber, the roaring of engines, the sound of screaming drones... Liftoff: Slipstream brings a new layer of excitement to Liftoff: FPV Drone Racing! Liftoff: Slipstream adds vehicles for you to chase in Liftoff
data.supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support
